reservation.title: MAKE A RESERVATION
reservation.days: Monday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday
reservation.description1: Make a reservation and come to enjoy the unique food.
reservation.description2: Your reservation will be annulled because of delay without informing us, after 15 minutes.
reservation.description3: We have child chairs, but please let us know if you bring baby carriage and you need space.
reservation.description4: For more requests or information, please call:

couponGift.description1: You loved visiting us and want somebody special to enjoy in Little Viet?
couponGift.description2: Buy online our coupon gift and receive it instantly by email.
